text:
I engage SK PEST MANAGEMENT SERVICES  on the on the 5 Aug 2021 to carried out Bedbug services at my place after speaking to three other PCO I decided to engage SK pest Mr rajesh to carried the.services .He arrived on time ,after inspection he explained in details  what he is doing and the.level of infestations I was having. Worried he  won
T be able to solve my problem as many bigger company Pest control had  also make promising promise but did not solve my problem.After treatment, all the adult Bedbug was dead ,was happy with the treatment. As what he told me after 5days ,I won,t see anymore adults bedbugs and arranged another round of treatment earlier in 11days ,based on my feedback .After second treatment all my bedbug was gone .I was so happy, I even got him to do my roaches infestations that too he done an excellent job with all the roaches dead after treatment. He was even so alert ,and was able to detect a drywood problem at my place ..and explained me the procedure. Got him to do it ,if not more damaged would had happened at my wooden flooring .
I highly recommend S K Pest management services. Although they are medium size local company they are very efficient and even better then bigger company or foreign company ,who did not solve my problem
Thumb up S K pest management services for your  excellent worked and service  Thanks for solving all my problems. üòÅ

I engage SK pest management services three month ago. When I was looking for pest control company most of them recommend thermal imaging, baiting and diff gadget to locate termites or bedbug.some even offer free survey but once I hear the price,I almost fall of my chair.The pricing was expensive.when add all the gadget in.Then Mr Raj called from  SK pest management services.He was professional ,in explaining in what I need to cleared my problem.He told me if the infestation of termites is low then doing ad hoc  ,two visits cycle will cleared my problem.Doing bedbug two visit  treatment ,with warranty will cleared my problem ,He even told me why I don't need gadget to locate termites and bedbug as these was additional tools to just .  ,bring up the value in the treatment pricing which sound logical as why need gadget to locate termites or bedbug when I already know I have the problem.He to me a professional tech wothuears of experience will be able to locate for termite or bedbug without using any tools .I decide to engaged SK pest management services.but was A bit worried as one of the review just said bad but no details. But as promised he cleared my bedbug within two visit without any additional visit treatment as I followed all the recommend instructions. For my termites he located a few more location without any gadgets and eradicated all ,I decided to do a maintenance with him as recommended.  He really very experience in locating for termites and bedbug .I staying in landed property,I had in place in ground station to help monitor and eradicated any  future attack against termites. I even get good reviews from my relatives. I had no regrets hiring SK pest management services. Trust me no regrets,thanks you sk pest management services.keep up the good job
dont engage this company. will just cheat off your money and also the person came late spray abit here and there and consider their job done.  pls go elsewhere
Very good and efficient..And value for money thumb up.
